CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Voting
CurrentVersion.description:
*This feature has been deprioritized for the time being as Whiteboard prioritizes other highly requested feature development. As a workaround, Whiteboard has features that accommodate lightweight voting such as sticky note reactions that can be used. 

This feature will bring a more formalized voting function to Whiteboard. This can be used in order to gather feedback from participants to come to conclusions during various activities. This will have the ability to be anonymous or not.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Voting
OldVersion.description: This feature will bring a more formalized voting function to Whiteboard. This can be used in order to gather feedback from participants to come to conclusions during various activities. This will have the ability to be anonymous or not.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: New “Add to playlist” functionality
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the functionality of the “Add to playlist” feature in Stream. Soon you will be able to add a video to playlists stored in SharePoint sites while viewing the video in the Stream web app. To add a video to a playlist in a SharePoint site you must be a member or owner of the site.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: New “Add to playlist” functionality
OldVersion.description: We are updating the functionality of the “Add to playlist” feature in Stream. Soon you will be able to add a video to playlists stored in SharePoint sites while viewing the video in the Stream web app. To add a video to a playlist in a SharePoint site you must be a member or owner of the site.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Navigation updates in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description: OneDrive for Web will soon support the ability to expand or collapse the left navigation bar. Additionally, OneDrive will have a new command, in the form of a button labeled “+ Add new”, for creating new content and uploading files/folders. This command will be available across Home, My Files, Shared, Favorites, Recycle bin, and all Shared libraries in the Quick Access section. Note: upload functionality will be accessed via the “+ Add new” command.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Navigation updates in OneDrive for Web
OldVersion.description: OneDrive for Web will soon support the ability to expand or collapse the left navigation bar. Additionally, OneDrive will have a new command, in the form of a button labeled “+ Add new”, for creating new content and uploading files/folders. This command will be available across Home, My Files, Shared, Favorites, Recycle bin, and all Shared libraries in the Quick Access section. Note: upload functionality will be accessed via the “+ Add new” command.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Color and font changes in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing minor color, font, and icon changes to user interface on OneDrive for Web.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Color and font changes in OneDrive for Web
OldVersion.description: We are introducing minor color, font, and icon changes to user interface on OneDrive for Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add video to existing playlist
CurrentVersion.description: Soon you will be able to search for existing playlists when you add a video to a playlist from Stream web app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add video to existing playlist
OldVersion.description: Soon you will be able to search for existing playlists when you add a video to a playlist from Stream web app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Insert and playback videos in Word and PowerPoint
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows customers to insert Stream (on SharePoint) videos into PowerPoint and Word using the existing "Insert Online Video" feature in those apps. Video playback happens inline within Word and PowerPoint with enhanced playback features such as transcripts, captions, search, chapters, and playback speed controls. Stream (on SharePoint) videos are videos stored in a user's OneDrive Business account or in SharePoint. Note: Video insertion will be available on desktop client and web, but not on mobile. Video playback will be available on desktop client, web and mobile. PowerPoint for Mac is supported; however, Word for Mac is not supported.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Insert and playback videos in Word and PowerPoint
OldVersion.description: This feature allows customers to insert Stream (on SharePoint) videos into PowerPoint and Word using the existing "Insert Online Video" feature in those apps. Video playback happens inline within Word and PowerPoint with enhanced playback features such as transcripts, captions, search, chapters, and playback speed controls. Stream (on SharePoint) videos are videos stored in a user's OneDrive Business account or in SharePoint. Note: Video insertion will be available on desktop client and web, but not on mobile. Video playback will be available on desktop client, web and mobile. PowerPoint for Mac is supported; however, Word for Mac is not supported.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-app Teams devices store experience
CurrentVersion.description: With the Teams device store experience inside the Teams app, customers can easily discover and purchase certified Teams devices for personal or shared use cases – headsets, web cameras, desk phones, Teams Rooms, and more. Explore devices in categories, use search or filters to find desired device, and purchase all through the familiar Microsoft Teams interface. We are introducing a new experience for small businesses to purchase devices directly within Teams, businesses in the US and Canada will now be able to complete their purchase without leaving the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-app Teams devices store experience
OldVersion.description: With the Teams device store experience inside the Teams app, customers can easily discover and purchase certified Teams devices for personal or shared use cases – headsets, web cameras, desk phones, Teams Rooms, and more. Explore devices in categories, use search or filters to find desired device, and purchase all through the familiar Microsoft Teams interface. We are introducing a new experience for small businesses to purchase devices directly within Teams, businesses in the US and Canada will now be able to complete their purchase without leaving the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
OldVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Containers are a powerful tool for organizing and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
OldVersion.description: Containers are a powerful tool for organizing and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
OldVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
CurrentVersion.description: ,A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
OldVersion.description: ,A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Chat shown by default in Gallery View for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting Chat is now shown by default when joining a Teams meeting with Teams Rooms on Windows in Gallery View, making it easier to see incoming chat messages on the front of room display. IT Admins can configure the default chat experience for a room, and users can make in-meeting changes to show or hide the chat using the touch console.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Chat shown by default in Gallery View for Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: Meeting Chat is now shown by default when joining a Teams meeting with Teams Rooms on Windows in Gallery View, making it easier to see incoming chat messages on the front of room display. IT Admins can configure the default chat experience for a room, and users can make in-meeting changes to show or hide the chat using the touch console.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Preset Organizational Backgrounds (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: When enabled, a user will have a preset background defined by the IT admin without the ability to change the background.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Preset Organizational Backgrounds (Premium)
OldVersion.description: When enabled, a user will have a preset background defined by the IT admin without the ability to change the background.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared call history for delegates and delegators
CurrentVersion.description: We're continuing to provide a more tailored call delegation experience. Call delegators and delegates will now be able to see shared call history records for the shared line.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared call history for delegates and delegators
OldVersion.description: We're continuing to provide a more tailored call delegation experience. Call delegators and delegates will now be able to see shared call history records for the shared line.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
OldVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Redesigned Message Bars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Infobars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows are redesigned to be more effective at conveying relevant information and communicating possible actions. They are also dismissible in the Compose form. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Redesigned Message Bars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Infobars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows are redesigned to be more effective at conveying relevant information and communicating possible actions. They are also dismissible in the Compose form. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced privacy control: Limiting PII data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced privacy control: Limiting PII data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
OldVersion.description: ,With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: ,To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
OldVersion.description: ,To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: ,To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
OldVersion.description: ,To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Purview Activity Explorer - Limiting sensitive data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Purview Activity Explorer - Limiting sensitive data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
OldVersion.description: With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts plugin for Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description:
Frontline Managers can use the Shifts plug-in for Copilot to retrieve insights on shifts, open shifts and time off leveraging data from the Shifts app in addition to user and company
 data it’s able to access.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts plugin for Copilot for Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description:
Frontline Managers can use the Shifts plug-in for Copilot to retrieve insights on shifts, open shifts and time off leveraging data from the Shifts app in addition to user and company
 data it’s able to access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
CurrentVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
OldVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
CurrentVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
OldVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Proactive document summarization
CurrentVersion.description: Automatically see a Copilot-generated summary of a document you open.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Show Chat info in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Chat users can have access to contextual information including members, pinned messages, shared files and links, and entry point to contextual search from this canvas.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Introducing content pane
CurrentVersion.description: The content pane is a new place for relevant panes that help authors create their publications. With the introduction of this centralized location, a new toolbox will help authors quickly browse and add content to create rich and engaging pages. The content pane will include additional panes such as configuration tools and design ideas. Within Viva Amplify, the content pane is used to host the distribution channel selection, writing guidance, and audience selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Easier to find your most recent templates
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to the Viva Amplify template display include showing the most recently modified templates on the campaign overview page for easy access and separating the Viva Amplify provided templates from the user-saved campaign templates.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Improved authoring experience
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the Viva Amplify editors for both Outlook and Teams distribution channels to improve previewing and editing. These updates will provide improvements to load time and create a coherent audience selection experience across the channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Formula data summaries in rows and cells
CurrentVersion.description: Add a single formula to summarize column data into one cell. Today, full column calculations produce a unique result in each row, but this new feature gives you the option to calculate all data in a column together to return one result. You can also create a row with formulas that apply for relevant columns; for example, an "add total sales row" will add a SUM formula underneath every column that has sales data.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: eSignature sequential signing
CurrentVersion.description: Sequential signing enables the creator of an eSignature request to specify the sequence of recipients. The document is first signed by the initial recipient in the sequence, then forwarded to the subsequent recipient for their signature. This process continues in the designated order until every recipient has added their signature. Once everyone has signed, the signed document is made available to all involved.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Coherent Workplace Search experience across Microsoft Search in Bing, SharePoint and Office.com
CurrentVersion.description: Users see the same search results no matter where they are across Microsoft Search in Bing, SharePoint and Office.com in all native verticals (All, Files, Sites, Images, Messages, People)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Coherent Workplace Search experience across Microsoft Search in Bing, SharePoint and Office.com
OldVersion.description: Users see the same search results no matter where they are across Microsoft Search in Bing, SharePoint and Office.com in all native verticals (All, Files, Sites, Images, Messages, People)

*This feature has been deprioritized for the time being as Whiteboard prioritizes other highly requested feature development. As a workaround, Whiteboard has features that accommodate lightweight voting such as sticky note reactions that can be used. 

This feature will bring a more formalized voting function to Whiteboard. This can be used in order to gather feedback from participants to come to conclusions during various activities. This will have the ability to be anonymous or not.
